评论概述: i love the flat back screw posts
评论详情: The duckies are adorable, very high quality, and most of all I love the flat back screw on posts. I could sleep in these.
The earrings are so adorable! Thanks
Super comfortable and love the back.  The backs are flat so they don’t dig into your skin.  Easy to get on and off.  Plus they are super cute.

评论概述: Keep an eye on the backings
评论详情: Cute earrings, but the flat screw backing does not secure sufficiently the post (not enough depth or even enough rotations).  Though I check them daily, I found that today, the backing had come loose and the earring fell out.  Good thing I was sedentary, else I’d not have noticed or found both earring parts.  Won’t buy earrings with that flat type of screw backing ever again.

These are so pretty. I was excited that these have flat backs, however, the hummingbird's beak if very sharp so sleeping in them was a no-go.  The other thing i didnt love is that both earring face the same way which I find to be a little odd... in fairness, that is how they are pictured, I just didnt really notice until I saw them on.

Very cute little hummingbird earrings in sweet colors. The quality is good for the price. The most noteworthy feature is the backs which screw on, making this a good choice for children's pierced ears, or anyone who likes dainty earrings that they won't lose while wearing them.
